argument.name: ls
argument.description: Local storage. Use *[js:{dialog.object}._localStorageSettings]* to get the local storage settings in the UX Component.

argument.name: listID
argument.description: The ID of the List control to initilize.

argument.name: flagIncludeBase
argument.description: Default = *[js:false]*. If *[js:true]*, list data is deleted. If *[js:false]*, only list edits, synchronized edits, and synchronized deletes are delete, retaining the original list data.

page.description: Use to delete persisted List data (including edits) from Local Storage or the File System (PhoneGap applications.)
